DOC.brief_summary: A clinical study subclinical enthesitis synovitis patient vulgaris psoriasis
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Subclinical Enthesitis Synovitis Patients With Vulgaris Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: A total 100 patient vulgaris psoriasis 100 age-matched control skin disease , without musculoskeletal disease , recruit . They undergo dermatological assessment blind PDUS evaluation . Clinical assessment include demographic , severity psoriasis , musculoskeletal clinical examination sport activity . PDUS evaluation consist detection grey scale ( GS ) synovitis synovial PD signal joint extremity , GS enthesopathy entheseal PD signal entheses low limb .
DOC.criteria: age≥18years patient vulgaris psoriasis ( dur patient skin disease without musculoskeletal disorder joint involvement clinical symptom sign enthesitis synovitis BMI≥24 history gout arthritis peripheral neurological disease lower extremity trauma receive systemic therapy ( i.e.NSAIDs , corticosteroid , immunosuppressant , retinoids biological agent ) 3 month pregnant breastfeeding
